Erica Dawson bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri na prọfesọ
Ọ bụ onye dere nchịkọta uri atọ.
Dawson tolitere na Columbia, Maryland. Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere B.A
na Mahadum Johns Hopkins na nzere Master of Fine Arts na Poetry na Mahadum Ohio State, ọ nwetara Ph.D
na Mahadum Cincinnati dị ka Elliston Fellow na Poetry.

Nchịkọta uri mbụ Dawson, Big-Eyed Afraid (Waywiser Press, 2007), ahọpụtara maka afọ 2006 Anthony Hecht Poetry Prize site na Mary Jo Salter ma kpọọ ya Best Debut nke afọ  2007 site na Contemporary Poetry Review. Nchịkọta nke abụọ ya, The Small Blades Hurt (Measure Press, 2014), meriri afọ 2016 Poets' Prize. Nchịkọta nke atọ, When Rap Spoke Straight to God, bụ nke Tin House Books bipụtara n'afọ 2018. Abụ Dawson apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere Barrow Street, Blackbird, na The Best American Poetry nke afọ 2008, 2012, na 2015.

A maara Dawson maka ojiji ọhụrụ nke ụdị ọdịnala. N'afọ 2010, a sịrị na o nwetara "ihe dị ka ọkwa kpakpando rok" n'etiti ndị na-ede uri New Formalist. Ọ bi na Tampa, Florida, ebe ọ na-eduzi Mahadum nke Tampa's Low-Residency MFA na Creative Writing ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta uri nke Tampa Review.
